item.title: Hate for Hate
item.description: Hate for Hate is a 1967 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Domenico Paolella.

item.title: Execution
item.description: Execution is a 1968 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Domenico Paolella.

item.title: A Genius, Two Partners and a Dupe
item.description: A Genius, Two Partners and a Dupe (Italian: Un genio, due compari, un pollo is a 1975 spaghetti western comedy film directed by Damiano Damiani and Sergio Leone, who directed the opening scene.

item.title: John the Bastard
item.description: John the Bastard is a 1967 Italian Spaghetti Western film written and directed by Armando Crispino and starring John Richardson.

item.title: Renegade Riders
item.description: Renegade Riders is an Italian spaghetti western film. It represents the official film debut for director Enzo G. Castellari of Few Dollars for Django. The film stars Edd Byrnes and Guy Madison.

item.title: Trusting Is Good... Shooting Is Better
item.description: Trusting Is Good... Shooting Is Better is a 1968 Italian Spaghetti Western film written and directed by Osvaldo Civirani.

item.title: Pecos Cleans Up
item.description: Pecos è qui: prega e muori is a 1967 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Maurizio Lucidi.
